name: Stop ACTA Ribbon
author: Konjunktion

sections.description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop ACTA” will be put on in the top left corner of your website, linking to the http://www.stopp-acta.info/ website. If you want to have a look on it, visit http://www.konjunktion.info.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip archive.
  2. Extract it in your wp-content/plugins folder or upload via admin panel.
  3. Browse to your plugins section and active the plugin.

short_description: Help stop Worlwide Consorship by putting a ribbon that says Stop ACTA in the top of the left corner of your WordPress site or network.
description: A black ribbon with the words “Stop ACTA” will be put on in the top left corner of your website, linking to the http://www.stopp-acta.info/ website. If you want to have a look on it, visit http://www.konjunktion.info.
